entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
